00031 #define UA_TYPE_BINARY_ENCODING(TYPE)                                   \
00032     UA_StatusCode TYPE##_encodeBinary(TYPE const *src, UA_ByteString *dst, size_t *UA_RESTRICT offset); \
00033     UA_StatusCode TYPE##_decodeBinary(UA_ByteString const *src, size_t *UA_RESTRICT offset, TYPE *dst);

00038 #define UA_SByte_decodeBinary(src, offset, dst) UA_Byte_decodeBinary(src, offset, (UA_Byte *)dst)
